1.0.1.en: Receive Messages from Telegram to your Homey

1.0.3.en: Added Homey Community Topic to the manifest

1.0.5.en: German Translation, Updated Readme and assets

1.0.6.en: Added Logs to the settings page. Added Dutch translation - Thanks to @Twan_Veugelers

1.0.9.en: Added 'A new user/chat has been discovered' flow card, Added support for a password for the /start command

1.1.1.en: Added Send Image Flow Card with Homey Images

1.1.3.en: Added italian translation thanks to ilpaolino

1.2.1.en: Beta 2 of the question system. Adding Translations, little bug fixes

1.2.2.en: Beta 3 of question system. Added IT translation

1.2.3.en: Beta 4 of the question system. Added edit mode, fix grammar

1.2.4.en: Beta 5 of the question system. Made Settingspage more user friendly

2.0.4.en: Added silent questions toggle (No Notification Sound), Added silent message flow card (No Notification Sound), Internal structure changes

2.0.5.en: Added debug logs filter for the settings page

2.1.0.en: Added new Question has been answered card with both fields autocompletion

2.1.3.en: Updated settings page, editable columns for questions, custom id questions, delete messages

2.1.5.en: Updated Translation. BLL support disabled (causing issues)

2.1.6.en: Added Delete by Id & ChatId, Added to the Question when cards ChatId & MessageId

2.2.0.en: Homey Pro 2023 support. Updated Settings. Multiple new Cards. New Design & Name

2.2.1.en: Added debugging for Image Flow Card

2.2.3.en: Fixed an issue with Image Tags on the Homey Pro 2023.

2.2.5.en: Send a question with optional. Re-added BLL support
